FRAPP Functions

Functions to perform font-facilitated reading.

FRAPP.modify_word_font(word)

Modify word font

This takes in one word from latex file, checks word length, and bolds appropriate letters.

Parameters

word (str) – Word to be modified

Returns

latex compatible modified word

Return type

str

Example

‘espresso’ -> ‘textbf{espr}esso’
